Class RgbImageJ2me

java.lang.Object
  jjil.j2me.RgbImageJ2me

public class RgbImageJ2me
extends java.lang.Object

Implements a path in and out of RgbImage for J2ME Image objects.

Method Detail

toRgbImage

public static jjil.core.RgbImage toRgbImage(javax.microedition.lcdui.Image image)
Create an RgbImage from a javax.microedition.lcdui.Image image. The appropriate sized image area is created and the contents are copied from the input.

Parameters:
image - the javax.microedition.lcdui.Image image
Returns:
the RgbImage with the same contents as the javax.microedition.lcdui.Image.

toImage

public static javax.microedition.lcdui.Image toImage(jjil.core.RgbImage rgb)
Return a javax.microedition.lcdui.Image image with contents equal to the RGB image stored here. The transparency parameter is set to false so that the contents of the RgbImage's A byte are not examined.

Parameters:
rgb - the input RgbImage which is to be converted to a javax.microedition.lcdui.Image.
Returns:
An javax.microedition.lcdui.Image object with contents equal to this Image.
